announcements.title: Community Town Hall Meeting - January 2025
announcements.content: Join us for our quarterly town hall meeting to discuss constituency developments and priorities for Q1 2025. We'll cover infrastructure updates, health initiatives, and community projects.

announcements.title: Road Closure Notice - Main Street Rehabilitation
announcements.content: Main Street will be temporarily closed for rehabilitation works from February 1-15, 2025. Alternative routes will be available via Secondary Road and Market Lane. Please plan your journeys accordingly.

announcements.title: Free Health Screening Program - Age 40+
announcements.content: Free comprehensive health screening for all constituents aged 40 and above. Services include blood pressure checks, diabetes screening, and general health assessments. Registration now open at the constituency office.

announcements.title: Youth Skills Development Workshop
announcements.content: A three-day workshop on digital skills, entrepreneurship, and career development for youth aged 18-30. Limited spots available - apply now!

announcements.title: Constituency Development Fund Application Deadline
announcements.content: Applications for the Constituency Development Fund are now open. Projects focusing on education, health, and infrastructure development are encouraged. Deadline: February 28, 2025.

announcements.title: COVID-19 Vaccination Drive Extended
announcements.content: Our COVID-19 vaccination program has been extended through March 2025. All vaccine types available including boosters. Walk-ins welcome at all health centers.
